data.title: A local pizza shop with a good lunch meal
data.text: Made a quick trip to see the Richard Nixon Library and Museum and this little pizza shop was just down the street and has a lunch special of a Pizza or Spaghetti, with a side salad and drink for about $6.  The salad was simple and fresh (lettuce, spinach and onions), the mini pizza was made to order and took about 5 minutes.  The food was good and hit the spot.  This is a small mom and pop type operation that apparently has three shops in the area.
